changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO userpermission(canchange, canexecute, grantPermission, profile_id, role_id) SELECT false, true, true, id, 209 from userprofile WHERE name like "%administ%" AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM userpermission WHERE role_id=209 AND profile_id=userprofile.id)

changeSet.author: rmemoria

insert.column: TB case with no microscopy and culture result
classification=0 and diagnosisType=1 and not exists(select * from examculture cult where cult.case_id=a.id) and not exists(select * from exammicroscopy mic where mic.case_id=a.id)
DR-TB case with no DST result
classification=1 and diagnosisType=1 and not exists(select * from examdst exam where exam.case_id=a.id)

changeSet.sql: insert into tags_case (case_id, tag_id) select a.id, (select max(id) from tag where p.workspace_id=tag.workspace_id and tag_name='TB case with no microscopy and culture result') nv from tbcase a inner join patient p on p.id=a.patient_id and p.workspace_id=11 where classification=0 and diagnosisType=1 and not exists(select * from examculture cult where cult.case_id=a.id) and not exists(select * from exammicroscopy mic where mic.case_id=a.id)

insert into tags_case (case_id, tag_id) select a.id, (select max(id) from tag where p.workspace_id=tag.workspace_id and tag_name='DR-TB case with no DST result') nv from tbcase a inner join patient p on p.id=a.patient_id and p.workspace_id=11 where classification=1 and diagnosisType=1 and not exists(select * from examdst exam where exam.case_id=a.id)
